title: 'Comfortable'
body: The thickness is ok when compared to price. The colour fades with time but they are really comfortable. Only issue is the length of them is a bit short for tall people, hope they can increase the length. The durability is also good. It's been more than a year since I bought them for my spouse and they are still lasting.
